name: Urban Studies: Urbanism on Screen (Online)
content: Urban Studies: Urbanism on Screen (Online Course) - 3-28 August 2020 | The course comprises 3 modules/30 hours each including lectures/discussions (3 meetings), reading/watching, studying/writing, final assignment in the form of an essay - duration: 2-4 week long. For the course overview, objectives, and more information, please contact us on urbanstudies@lcir.co.uk. Register on https://registration.lcir.co.uk by 10 July (registration fee: 150 GBP by 10 July).
